abstract: Saudi Arabia's Supreme Court upholds verdict against Raif Badawi, liberal blogger found guilty of insulting Islam; Badawi has been sentenced to 10 years in prison and 1,000 lashes.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court upheld an internationally condemned verdict against Raif Badawi, a liberal blogger who was publicly flogged after being found guilty of insulting Islam.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia: Verdict on Blogger Stands
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia: Verdict on Blogger Stands

snippet: The Supreme Court upheld an internationally condemned verdict against Raif Badawi, a liberal blogger who was publicly flogged after being found guilty of insulting Islam.
